name: ENDLESS (Shade)
description:
ENDLESS is a Horror Adventure game heavily inspired by The Stanley Parable. Rather than focusing on one specific genre of horror, this game takes inspiration from many other games and media alike. There are currently seven endings in the game and seven more on the way. It is important to note that the new endings will release as soon as they are made to kickstarter backers.

Kickstarter Link: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/shademakesgames/endless-0
